name: Star wars BDLM
description:
Star wars bdlm is a RTS game with rectangular battlefield.

You are the commander of a battalion and you have a special mission for the empire !

Play a lot of battle on many planet in the main campaign, upgrade your soldier, vehicule, ship and other to improve your army.

Secondary mission with special objective like zombie mod are available, a sandbox mod and a war challenge to win more credit !

Project start in 2017.
